item.title: An alfred workflow for working with sequence data
item.description: I’ve put together a simple alfred workflow with a few utilities for working with sequence data. Download the latest release of Seq-Utilities Usage Generate a random dna sequence 200 base pairs long. Generate the complement, reverse complement, RNA, and protein of a DNA sequence Open up blast and pre-populate the search field blast ATGTCCTCGTTCGACCGTCGTATTGAAGCTGCATGTAAA
